resources.string: Feedback: You spend too much time at home, and did not do much outside exercise, which look not a good lifestyle.
1. This application will access your location data while it is running on this device.
2. The location will be recorded and updated every five to ten seconds.
3. Those data will be stored in this device and also be sent to the remote server for lifestyle analysis and feedback generation.
4. You can stop recording the location data by log out this application at anytime.
